verificationResult.responseBody:
<!DOCTYPE html>
        <html lang="en">
          <head>
            <meta charset="UTF-8" />
            <title>Error</title>
            <script type="module">
              const error = {"message":"Cannot find module '/root/ankr-labs-nx/node_modules/.pnpm/vite@6.4.1_@types+node@24.10.4_jiti@2.6.1_lightningcss@1.30.2_sass@1.51.0_terser@5.44.1_tsx@4.20.6_yaml@2.8.1/node_modules/vite/dist/node/chunks/dep-CvfTChi5.js' imported from /root/ankr-labs-nx/node_modules/.pnpm/vite@6.4.1_@types+node@24.10.4_jiti@2.6.1_lightningcss@1.30.2_sass@1.51.0_terser@5.44.1_tsx@4.20.6_yaml@2.8.1/node_modules/vite/dist/node/chunks/dep-D4NMHUTW.js","stack":"    at finalizeResolution (node:internal/modules/esm/resolve:283:11)\n    at moduleResolve (node:internal/modules/esm/resolve:952:10)\n    at defaultResolve (node:internal/modules/esm/resolve:1188:11)\n    at ModuleLoader.defaultResolve (node:internal/modules/esm/loader:708:12)\n    at #cachedDefaultResolve (node:internal/modules/esm/loader:657:25)\n    at ModuleLoader.resolve (node:internal/modules/esm/loader:640:38)\n    at ModuleLoader.getModuleJobForImport (node:internal/modules/esm/loader:264:38)\n    at ModuleLoader.import (node:internal/modules/esm/loader:605:34)\n    at defaultImportModuleDynamicallyForModule (node:internal/modules/esm/utils:221:31)\n    at importModuleDynamicallyCallback (node:internal/modules/esm/utils:260:12)","frame":""}
              try {
                const { ErrorOverlay } = await import("/pulse/@vite/client")
                document.body.appendChild(new ErrorOverlay(error))
              } catch {
                const h = (tag, text) => {
                  const el = document.createElement(tag)
                  el.textContent = text
                  return el
                }
                document.body.appendChild(h('h1', 'Internal Server Error'))
                document.body.appendChild(h('h2', error.message))
                document.body.appendChild(h('pre', error.stack))
